Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.card

Class GoldCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.card.GameCard
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.card.PlayableCard
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.card.GoldCard
public class GoldCard extends PlayableCard
The GoldCard class represents a specific type of playable card in the game, extending PlayableCard. It includes requirements, points mechanics, and methods to verify requirements and print card details.

  • Constructor Details

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard(int imageId, Symbol[] symbols, Kingdom kingdom, int points, boolean pointsForCoveringCorners, Symbol pointSymbol, Map<Symbol,Integer> requirements)
      Constructs a GoldCard with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      imageId - the ID of the image associated with the card
      symbols - an array of symbols to be assigned to the card's corners
      kingdom - the kingdom associated with the card
      points - the points value of the card
      pointsForCoveringCorners - true if the card awards points for covering corners, false otherwise
      pointSymbol - the symbol for which the card awards points, if any
      requirements - the map of symbol requirements for the card

  • Method Details

    • checkRequirementsMet

      public boolean checkRequirementsMet(HashMap<Symbol,Integer> visibleSymbols)
      Checks if the requirements of the card are met based on the visible symbols.
      Overrides:
      checkRequirementsMet in class PlayableCard
      Parameters:
      visibleSymbols - the map of visible symbols and their counts
      Returns:
      true if all requirements are met, false otherwise

    • getRequirements

      public Map<Symbol,Integer> getRequirements()
      Retrieves the requirements map of the card.
      Returns:
      the map of symbol requirements

    • getPointsForCoveringCorners

      public boolean getPointsForCoveringCorners()
      Checks if the card awards points for covering corners.
      Returns:
      true if points are awarded for covering corners, false otherwise

    • getCoveringSymbol

      public Symbol getCoveringSymbol()
      Retrieves the symbol for which the card awards points.
      Returns:
      the symbol for which points are awarded, or null if none
